plot: Lisa Loeb is beautiful, talented, famous, and single. Is there a man out there who is her Mr. Right? If so, how to find him? Follow the spunky, soulful singer on her trek through the hero's journey we call dating in the 21st century.
plot_en: Lisa Loeb is beautiful, talented, famous, and single. Is there a man out there who is her Mr. Right? If so, how to find him? Follow the spunky, soulful singer on her trek through the hero's journey we call dating in the 21st century.

title: #1 Single
